## LQTYStake class

Represents a user's LQTY stake and accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LQTYStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getLQTYStake()](./lib-base-u.readableliquity.getlqtystake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `LQTYStake` class.
